headline: Gutfeld: Nothing wrong with using a robot to kill a fiend
subHeadline: Critics question military tactics for domestic policing. My response? If it works, use it

utterances.speaker: KRIS VAN CLEAVE, CBS NEWS CORRESPONDENT
utterances.sentences: Bomb squads will tell you these robots can do pretty much anything a person can do. They can go upstairs. They have cameras. They have speakers so that they can communicate.
